entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
